name: Pizza Delivery Bagel (BagelMaster5000)
description:
Work the most insane pizza delivery job of all time, and try to make as much money as possible before you get fired!

Features include:

  • Many unlockable characters and cars!
  • 3 unique maps!
  • Full controller support!
  • Cartoony, hand-drawn art!
  • Original music performed on pirate accordion!

Defend yourself from...

  • The manager: who hates you and also everything.
  • Uptight customers with no patience for ""laziness"".
  • Blind drivers who couldn't care less what/who they drive into.
  • Internet pranksters who want to steal your pizzas for viral videos.
  • Meteors(?).
  • Aliens(????).

Created by Sammy Mahmoudi!

Special Physical Sticker Pack!!

If you purchase the special sticker pack tier of Pizza Delivery Bagel, I will mail you two beeg Pizza Delivery Bagel stickers (3x3") and a pack of 7 mini stickers!

You'll get a text file with my email in it. Just email me your address and a screenshot of your receipt and I will mail the stickers to you (...starting in mid-June when I get back from a vacation). The stickers are glossy, waterproof, and printed+cut by me!
